mapper.sql: id, money, giveCount AS giveCount, number, assistantId AS assistantId, fuctId AS fuctId, isDate AS isDate, busId AS busId, validDate AS validDate, gtId AS gtId, ctId AS ctId
mapper.delete: delete from t_member_rechargegive_assistant where busId=#{busId} and gtId=#{gtId}
mapper.select: select * from t_member_rechargegive_assistant where busId=#{busId} and ctId=#{ctId} and fuctId=#{fuctId}
mapper.delete: delete from t_member_rechargegive_assistant where busId=#{busId} and ctId=#{ctId}
